thread.title: Samsung Introduces New Smartphone Running on Tizen Platform
thread.title_full: Samsung Introduces New Smartphone Running on Tizen Platform - WSJ

author: Jonathan Cheng
title: Samsung Introduces New Smartphone Running on Tizen Platform
text:
SEOUL—Samsung Electronics Co. isn't giving up on carving out an alternative to Google Inc.’s Android operating system.
On Wednesday, the South Korean technology giant introduced a new midrange smartphone in India that runs on its homegrown Tizen platform.
The new phone, called the Samsung Z3, is the company’s second Tizen-powered...
